com.ojcoleman.ahni.hyperneat
Class HyperNEATEvolver

java.lang.Object
  com.ojcoleman.ahni.hyperneat.HyperNEATEvolver
All Implemented Interfaces:
Configurable, GeneticEventListener
public class HyperNEATEvolver
extends java.lang.Object
implements Configurable, GeneticEventListener

Configures and performs an AHNI evolutionary run.

Author:
Oliver Coleman
See Also:
Run

Constant Field Values

generation

protected int generation

fittest

protected Chromosome fittest

bestPerforming

protected Chromosome bestPerforming

fittestChromosomes

protected Chromosome[] fittestChromosomes
The fittest Chromosome from each generation.

bestPerformingChromosomes

protected Chromosome[] bestPerformingChromosomes
The best performing Chromosome from each generation. Sometimes this is equivalent to fittest depending on whether the fitness function defines performance independently.

bestFitnesses

protected double[] bestFitnesses
The highest fitness achieved in each generation, as a fraction of the maximum possible fitness. This is maintained as well as fittestChromosomes because the fitness achieved can vary when the fitness function is stochastic.

bestPerformances

protected double[] bestPerformances
The highest performance achieved in each generation. This is maintained as well as bestPerformingChromosomes because the performance achieved can vary when the fitness function is stochastic.

fireEvent

protected void fireEvent(AHNIEvent event)

run

public double[] run()
             throws java.lang.Exception
Perform a single run. This is synchronised as the object contains state variables (other than configurable properties) and so multiple runs should not be performed in parallel. This is in contrast to most Configurable objects that do not contain state variables other than configurable properties.

Returns:
An array containing the best performance achieved in each generation.
Throws:
java.lang.Exception

getFittestChromosomesForEachGen

public Chromosome[] getFittestChromosomesForEachGen()
Returns an array containing the fittest Chromosome from each generation.

getBesttPerformingChromosomesForEachGen

public Chromosome[] getBesttPerformingChromosomesForEachGen()
Returns an array containing the best performing Chromosome from each generation. This may be equivalent to the fittest Chromosomes depending on whether the fitness function defines performance independently.

getBestFitness

public double[] getBestFitness()
Returns an array of the highest fitness achieved, as a fraction of the maximum possible fitness, in each generation. This is maintained as well as the fittest Chromosomes because the fitness achieved can vary when the fitness function is stochastic.

getBestPerformance

public double[] getBestPerformance()
Returns an array of the highest performance achieved in each generation. This is maintained as well as best performing Chromosomes because the performance achieved can vary when the fitness function is stochastic.

getFittestFromLastGen

public Chromosome getFittestFromLastGen()
Returns:
The fittest Chromosome from the last generation.

getBestPerformingFromLastGen

public Chromosome getBestPerformingFromLastGen()
Returns:
The best performing Chromosome from the last generation. This may be equivalent to the fittest Chromosome depending on whether the fitness function defines performance independently.

getProportionalFitness

public double getProportionalFitness(Chromosome c)
Fitness of given Chromosome in proportion to maximum possible fitness.

Returns:
maximum fitness value

getTargetPerformance

public double getTargetPerformance()
Returns:
target fitness value, 0 ... 1

dispose

public void dispose()

geneticEventFired

public void geneticEventFired(GeneticEvent event)
Provides a translation from and passes through GeneticEvents to AHNIEvents via AHNIEventListeners.

Specified by:
geneticEventFired in interface GeneticEventListener
Parameters:
event - The event object that was fired. The type of event can be determined by the GeneticEvent's name.

getGeneration

public int getGeneration()
Returns the current generation number.

evolutionFinished

public boolean evolutionFinished()
Returns true iff evolution has finished or iff the current generation is the last one.
